languages.text: "Лучше уж над буквами сидеть, чем спину надрывать. Авось потом Лорд-капитан нас офицерами сделает".
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
languages.original_text: "Лучше уж над буквами сидеть, чем спину надрывать. Авось потом Лорд-капитан нас офицерами сделает".

traits.locale_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
"I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

languages.text: "Keine Ahnung, aber ich würde lieber Buchstaben zusammensetzen, als mir den Arsch wundzuarbeiten. Wer weiß, vielleicht macht uns der Lord Captain ja alle zu Offizieren."
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Ahnung, aber ich würde lieber Buchstaben zusammensetzen, als mir den Arsch wundzuarbeiten. Wer weiß, vielleicht macht uns der Lord Captain ja alle zu Offizieren."

languages.text: « J'en sais rien, mais je préfère coller des lettres les unes à la suite des autres, plutôt que me casser les reins au boulot. Qui sait, p'tet que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} fera de nous des officiers ? »
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

traits.locale_text: « J'en sais rien, mais je préfère coller des lettres les unes à la suite des autres, plutôt que me casser les reins au boulot. Qui sait, p'tet que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} fera de nous des officiers ? »

languages.text: «No sé, pero prefiero aprender a juntar letras que deslomarme trabajando. Y quién sabe, a lo mejor {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán nos nombra oficiales».
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

traits.locale_text: «No sé, pero prefiero aprender a juntar letras que deslomarme trabajando. Y quién sabe, a lo mejor {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán nos nombra oficiales».

languages.text: 「知らないけど、仕事で背中を痛めるぐらいなら、文字を並べる方がマシだよ。分からないだろ、もしかしたら、ロード・キャプテンが俺らを士官にしてくれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

traits.locale_text: 「知らないけど、仕事で背中を痛めるぐらいなら、文字を並べる方がマシだよ。分からないだろ、もしかしたら、ロード・キャプテンが俺らを士官にしてくれるかもしれない」

languages.text: “我也说不好，不过比起拼死拼活地干活，我更喜欢在这里拼字母。谁知道呢，说不定舰长大人会让我们当军官呢。”
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."

traits.locale_text: “我也说不好，不过比起拼死拼活地干活，我更喜欢在这里拼字母。谁知道呢，说不定舰长大人会让我们当军官呢。”

languages.text: "Ne bilem, eşek gibi çalışacağıma iki harfi bir araya getirmeyi yeğlerim. Lord Kaptan bizi subay yapar belkim."
languages.original_text: "I dunno, I'd rather put letters together than break my back working. Who knows, p'r'aps the Lord Captain will make us officers."
